product_name: Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The rimless Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses give you unobstructed views of the surf, sand and sea. Advanced lenses offer auto-adjust tint, clarity, contrast and vivid colors. ChromaPop lenses use a proprietary technology to optimize color and increase clarity and definition, enabling you to see the outside world with exceptional vibrance. UV-sensitive, self-adjusting Polarchromic lenses respond to ambient light, offering crisp optics and soothing light levels from dawn until dusk. Polarized glass lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black frame color features rose-tinted lenses, ideal for medium-to-bright light. The Smith Trailblazer ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses feature a hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends that get tacky when wet for grip during exercise and hot weather. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants.
